author: amitoverflow-ui
body:
## Summary of the new feature/enhancement
Are there any plans to support - New-JobTrigger cmdlet in powershell core?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@amitoverflow-ui The cmdlet is in PSScheduledJob module which is Windows component. The module is still not PowerShell Core compatible. You can ask about this in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellModuleCoverage repository.
GitHub
PowerShell/PowerShellModuleCoverage
Track issues related to using Windows PowerShell modules with PowerShell - PowerShell/PowerShellModuleCoverage

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as answered and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: New-JobTrigger support in powershell core
